Make Learning Fun with Rody-Chick-Fun! Transform screen time into brain time! Rody-Chick-Fun is the perfect educational app designed to help children aged 4-10 develop essential cognitive skills through fun, engaging gameplay. WHY KIDS LOVE IT

Beautiful, colorful animations that capture attention
Instant feedback with celebration effects
No reading required - perfect for young learners
Achievable challenges that build confidence
Reward system with unlockable achievements
FOUR AMAZING GAMES Memory Cards
Find matching pairs in this classic memory game! 16 adorable emoji cards with smooth 3D flip animations help develop visual memory and concentration. Perfect for building focus and pattern recognition skills.Pattern Match
Watch, remember, and repeat! This Simon Says-style game challenges kids to memorize increasingly complex color sequences. Develops short-term memory, attention span, and sequential thinking. Color Match
Race against time to match colors! Fast-paced gameplay helps improve quick thinking, color recognition, and decision-making skills. Kids learn to process information quickly while having a blast. Shape Match
Find matching shapes and colors in this progressive puzzle game! Multiple difficulty levels adapt as your child improves, teaching logical thinking and problem-solving.
 TRACK PROGRESS
Individual best scores for each game
Total score tracking
6 unlockable achievement badges
Beautiful statistics charts
Celebrate every milestone!
 PARENT-APPROVED FEATURES
 100% Safe - No ads, no in-app purchases
 Privacy First - No data collection, completely offline
Age Appropriate - Designed specifically for ages 4-10
 Educational - Based on cognitive development principles
Screen Time Well Spent - Learning disguised as play
COPPA Compliant - Meets all child safety standards EDUCATIONAL BENEFITSCognitive Development:
Enhances short and long-term memory
Improves concentration and focus
Develops pattern recognition
Strengthens problem-solving abilities
Boosts processing speed

Welcome to NovelMax – your ultimate destination for thrilling adventures and unforgettable stories!

At NovelMax, we bring you a treasure chest of novels that transport you to incredible worlds. Whether you're diving into epic Western fantasies with mythical creatures and heroic quests or exploring the magic of Eastern fantasies like wuxia, xianxia, and xuanhuan, there's always something to spark your imagination.

Love leveling up? We've got you covered with system stories, litRPGs, and progression fantasy. Join your favorite characters as they unlock powers, tackle challenges, and conquer immersive game-like worlds.

With NovelMax, you'll have access to a massive library of amazing stories from talented authors all over the globe. Our app is designed to give you a seamless reading experience – just you and the story, no distractions.

And for those who love to listen, our audiobook collection is a game-changer. Expertly narrated by skilled voice artists, these audiobooks let you enjoy your favorite tales while you're on the go or simply unwinding after a long day.

So, what are you waiting for? Jump into NovelMax today and start your next great adventure. The story of a lifetime is just a page – or a play button – away!

Wattpad. Where stories live.
Discover the world's most-loved social storytelling platform. Wattpad connects a global community of millions of readers and writers through the power of story. Download it today to start reading or writing original stories.

Get your story discovered
Have your own story to tell? Get it discovered through the power of community and technology on Wattpad. Share an original story on Wattpad and share it with our community who are there to cheer you on throughout your writing journey. Think your story could be the next blockbuster? Wattpad Studios discovers untapped, unsigned, and talented writers on Wattpad and connects them to global multi-media entertainment companies.

Read original stories
Discover stories in over 25 languages from writers around the world! Whatever you’re into reading—romance, science fiction, mystery, comedy, action adventure, fantasy, young adult fiction, or fanfiction—it’s all on Wattpad. So whether you’re looking for more LGBT meet-cutes, cyberpunk fairy tales, or new technothrillers to devour, you’ll find it all, and so much more, on Wattpad.

Connect with a community of story-lovers
When you join Wattpad, you become a member of an international community of story-lovers. Connect with other passionate readers & writers, comment directly in stories as you read them, and support writers as they create and share their original stories. You can even read together and share your library or create reading lists so your friends always know what you’re reading.

Start your own free library
Save your favorite stories to keep them with you wherever you go. Hooked on a story? Simply sync your account to easily pick up where you left off, whether you’re on your laptop, tablet, Kindle or iPhone.

Read the stories that inspired blockbusters
If you’ve streamed Light as a Feather on Hulu or read New York Times best-seller Anna Todd’s series After, you may not know—these stories were first discovered on Wattpad. Join the platform the entertainment industry scours to find its next big hit, and start reading tomorrow’s box-office sensation today.

Biblia Română (Romanian Holy Bible)
Cornilescu (1921)
Dumitru Cornilescu (n. 4 aprilie 1891, comuna Slașoma, județul Mehedinți - d. 1975, Elveția) a fost ierodiacon și autor al unei traduceri în limba română a Bibliei, publicată în 1921, traducere care este în prezent cea mai răspândită traducere în rândul confesiunilor protestante (inclusiv cele neoprotestante).
Biblia (din lb. greacă βιβλίον, pl. βιβλία -cărți) se referă la scripturile sacre din iudaism și creștinism. Aceste scripturi sunt compilații ale unor documente separate (numite „cărți”) scrise într-un interval de timp de circa 1000 de ani. Numai Vechiul Testament are circa 100-150 scriitori diferiți, provenind din intelectualitatea aflată în serviciul conducătorilor politici. Cărțile sale au fost publicate separat și adunate în secolele I-II e.n. pentru a forma prima Biblie ebraică, Tanach, iar mai târziu, cu adăugiri, Biblia creștină, numită de creștini și Sfânta Scriptură.
Prima parte a Bibliei creștine este numită Vechiul Testament (din grecescul "palaia diathékè"). Vechiul Testament reprezintă în mare traducerea grecească (sau din aceasta în alte limbi) a textului sacru ebraic așa cum era el prin secol II î.e.n. O împărțire cu origine evreiască pe criterii funcționale a Vechiului Testament îl împarte pe acesta în Legea ("Legea lui Moise", "Pentateucul", adică primele "cinci cărți" ale Bibliei), Profeții și Scrierile Sfinte. A doua parte a Bibliei creștine este numită Noul Testament.
Prima traducere integrală a Bibliei în limba română a fost tipărită în 1688. Biblia a cunoscut mai multe traduceri în limba română. Denominațiile neoprotestante folosesc traducerea Bibliei în limba română de Dumitru Cornilescu, cu sau fără explicații. De remarcat că traducerea Cornilescu a fost inițial acceptată de Biserica Ortodoxă, prima traducere a lui Dumitru Cornilescu a apărut cu binecuvântarea patriarhului României, fiind ulterior respinsă de Biserica Ortodoxă (după ce preotul Dumitru Cornilescu a început să dea învățături specifice cultelor evanghelice cum ar fi îndreptățirea prin credință), dar folosită de Oastea Domnului și de confesiunile neoprotestante. Criticii din vremea publicării ei au considerat-o „net superioară oricărei alte traduceri, fiind prezentată într-o limbă suplă și curgătoare, care lipsește oricărei alte traduceri; fiind expusă într-o limbă care vorbește înseși inimilor oamenilor”. Biserica Ortodoxă Română a generat, la rândul ei, mai multe traduceri de-a lungul timpului, fie integrale fie parțiale, a Sfintei Scripturi, e.g., Biblia „Carol al II-lea”, Palia de la Orăștie, „Biblia pe versuri tocmită”.

AudioTribe este primul app din România care adună laolaltă peste 10.000 de audiobooks premium, în română și engleză. Odată cu aplicația AudioTribe, descarci de fapt o bibliotecă de buzunar, cu mii de titluri celebre. Un companion perfect, care-ți spune povești oricând ai chef sau, uneori, un motiv bun să-ți pui căștile în urechi și să iei o pauză.

La AudioTribe:
- Ai acces exclusiv la o selecție de audiobook-uri premium.
- Ai un audiobook pentru orice moment - SF, fantasy, thrillers, povești pentru copii, cărți de dezvoltare personală.
- Conduci? Poți trece pe driving mode, o interfață simplificată.
- Descarci audibook-urile tale preferate și asculți offline, fără întreruperi.
- Poți schimba viteza de narare a audiobook-ului așa cum ți-e mai confortabil.
- Ai night mode și sleep timer. Combo-ul perfect ca să adormi liniștit.Cu AudioTribe, mersul la cumpărături poate deveni o bătălie legendară. Drumurile lungi cu mașina se transformă în călătorii pe tărâmuri fantastice. Gătitul, într-o poveste de dragoste. Alergarea, într-o vânătoare de dragoni. Atunci când vii în comunitatea AudioTribe, vii printre cei care știu să transforme orice moment obișnuit într-unul de poveste. Ascultă audiobook-uri ca.

Dune, Atomic Habits, Urzeala tronurilor, Acolo unde cântă racii, Biblioteca de la Miezul Nopții, Începe cu de ce, seria Witcher, colecția Stephen King, Tată bogat, tata sărac, Micul prinț.Transformă momentele tale de rutină în momente de poveste, cu AudioTribe.

Meloshort: Your Ultimate Destination for Popular Short Dramas and Must-Watch Mini-Series

In today’s fast-paced world, finding time to unwind and enjoy quality entertainment can be a challenge. That’s where Meloshort comes in — the ultimate app designed specifically for busy viewers like you, who crave engaging stories but have limited time. With episodes lasting just 1 to 2 minutes, Meloshort offers a vast and diverse library of popular short dramas and must-watch mini-series that perfectly fit into your fragmented schedule.
Whether you are commuting, grabbing a quick coffee break, or just squeezing in some entertainment between daily tasks, Meloshort lets you dive into cinematic-quality storytelling anytime, anywhere. Experience the grandeur of ancient costume dramas, the sweetness and charm of modern romances, the thrill of intense boss hero stories, or the gripping suspense of revenge thrillers — all in beautifully produced HD formats that bring these worlds to life on your screen.

Diverse Genres to Match Every Mood

With new episodes and series added every week, your watchlist will never run dry. Our smart recommendation engine learns your tastes and suggests fresh content tailored just for you, helping you discover your next favorite popular short drama or must-watch mini-series effortlessly.

Features Tailored for Your Viewing Pleasure
Meloshort isn’t just about great stories — it’s about making your viewing experience smooth, personalized, and enjoyable. Some of our key features include:
- Playback Speed Control: Adjust episode speed to match your viewing pace — slow down to savor moments or speed up when you’re short on time.

- User-Friendly Interface: Navigate effortlessly through a sleek, intuitive design with stunning HD visuals that make every episode a pleasure to watch.

Global Appeal and Accessibility
Recognizing the global audience we serve, Meloshort supports:
- Multilingual Subtitles: Catering to viewers worldwide by providing subtitles in multiple languages.
- Localized Dubbing: Enjoy your favorite dramas in your native language with high-quality dubbing options.
From palace intrigues and CEO romances to campus crushes and emotional urban tales, Meloshort delivers a rich tapestry of stories that resonate across cultures and geographies.

Why Choose Meloshort?
- Optimized for Busy Lives: Episodes last just 1-2 minutes, perfect for watching on the go or during short breaks.
- High-Quality Content: Each drama is carefully selected or produced with cinematic quality, offering you an immersive viewing experience.
- Constantly Updated Library: Fresh content added weekly keeps the excitement alive and your watchlist full.
- Smart Recommendations: Our intelligent algorithm helps you find exactly the kinds of shows you’ll love.

Download Meloshort Today!
Join millions of viewers worldwide who have made Meloshort their go-to app for bite-sized entertainment. Experience fast, high-quality storytelling designed perfectly for your busy lifestyle. Download Meloshort now, start exploring the hottest popular short dramas and must-watch mini-series, and never miss a moment of great storytelling again!

DYNAMIC CONTENT WITHIN THE BIBLE

ENGAGING VISUALS

INTERACTIVE BIBLE ENGAGEMENT

CUSTOM CHARACTERS

OTHER FEATURES OF THE SUPERBOOK BIBLE APP FOR KIDS

So download the SUPERBOOK kids Bible app and get ready to start the adventure of a lifetime!

O aplicatie - nadajduim - de folos duhovnicesc, ce contine peste 500 de carti ortodoxe printre care: 
     - Biblia Ortodoxa (varianta explicata a IPS Bartolomeu Anania)
     - Filocalia sau treptele desavarsirii
     - Vietile Sfintilor
     - acatiste si rugaciuni [inclusiv acatistul Sfantului Cuvios Paisie Aghioritul]
     - scrieri duhovnicesti
     - catehism ortodox
     - molitfelnic
     - carti de apologetica

Cartile sunt grupate dupa categorii si pot fi cautate dupa numele lor. 

Aplicatia stie sa citeasca textele in romaneste, insa nu recomandam folosirea acestui feature pentru acatiste, rugaciuni.

Continutul cartilor poate fi trimis prietenilor prin SMS [un citat], Facebook [citate in limita a 1000 caractere] sau Email [ citat / intregul continut al cartii curente].

Optiunile de customizare a interfetei [culoare tema, marimea si tipul fontului] cat si feature-ul de impiedicare a modului stand-by fac din aceasta aplicatie un cititor de carti foarte util si placut.

Compatibilitate cu iPhone, iPod si iPad cu versiunea de sistem minim iOS 6.0. Pentru feature-ul de citit in romaneste este necesar minim iOS 7.0. Este oferit suport si pentru noua versiune iOS9.

Multumim bunavointei dezvoltatorilor aplicatiei: Biblia Ortodoxa,Rugaciuni, care au dispus de majoritatea matierialelor cu folos duhovnicesc!

Oferim suport si primim sugestii la: ortobooks@a-tco.ro

My Fiction: Stories & Novels is the premiere app for the best serialized fiction in the world! 

Our stories feature high-stakes drama and heart-stopping romances. From billionaires to bad boys, werewolves to sports stars, My Fiction features the kinds of stories that will sweep you away. Our authors are New York Times and USA Today Bestselling authors, Indie and TikTok superstars and the best emerging authors from across the globe. 

Come discover your next new obsession—we have thousands of books and authors to choose from. Download and start reading for free now!

My Fiction features stories of all genres along with heat levels to match whatever mood you're in. So indulge your fantasies. And be sure to check out some of our fan-favorite stories:

Shifted Fate
Amy was the Luna of her pack, growing a pup in her stomach when the alpha betrayed her and took her life, and that of her pup. When she woke up six years earlier she decided to change everything. Revenge would be something she focused on.

Justice For Juniper
"Your husband cheated with my wife," her boss said. Juniper froze, watching the betrayal on screen, pain tearing through her belly. “My baby...” When she woke again, she saw the three powerful men rushing into her room filled with regret and desire... 

Mated to Two Bad Boy Alphas
Ever since Lia spilled juice on Zane Adams at six, his friends made her life miserable—but when the mysterious Blake shows up to protect her, everything changes. Now, both boys want her…and on her sixteenth birthday, she hears them both growl “mine.” 

Tempting The Mafia Twins
My Mafia husband slept with the woman who killed our baby, and his sister filmed it.  
I tipped off the FBI about his crimes and fled his insane mob family.  
Now, he's locked down the entire city just to hunt me down. 

The Pack's Doctor
Yara is a werewolf, hiding in a human university, studying medicine. One day, when Yara is out letting her wolf run, she comes across Alpha Warren, caught in a bear trap. She saves him, but surprisingly finds out he was her mate.  Warren, a strong and powerful Alpha, finally finds his mate. He's unwilling to let her go, so he took Yara to his pack. 

Want to be part of our Community?
Are you a writer looking for a way to connect with readers? We’re always looking for authors to share their stories. Through our talented team of professional editors, copyeditors, artists and publicists and marketing strategists, we’ll elevate your voice and support your creativity. 

Whether you’re a reader or an author, at My Fiction, you belong.
